description.attr1: Replaces the standard turrets with twin variants.
Doubling ammo delivered at a big cost of accuracy. A close range engagement is recommended.
In addition to the accuracy cost, as a result of the larger size, these turrets have a smaller range of movement than the standard turrets.
While the Pride often touts its group strength, their members aren't shy to spend their bounties on equipment to give them an edge. In this case a sizable percentage of the original ship's cost.
Further boosts to ammo capacity and re-fire rate are recommended.
